text: Arras (; ) is a commune. It is the prefecture of the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region. ==Sister cities== Arras is twinned with: * Chemnitz, Germany, since 1967 * Herten, Germany, since 1984 * Oudenaarde, Belgium, since 1990 * Ipswich, United Kingdom, since 1992 * Duisburg, Germany, since 2010
title: Arras
